name: SURVIVOR (itch) (Aymco)
description:
I made an upgrade with a little bit better controls and a sort of tutorial. I also added particles but quickly. Hope you will enjoy !

Controls:

Space to attract the players together.

WASD or the arrows for moving.

E to dash.

the 2 players have different abilities :

The ball roll and can dash by pressing E or the mouse. It have a small mass.

The rocket have a big mass but can only turn and go forward.

Press space to attract them together !

The goal is to find the green cube with the better score !

To get score you can just survive or kill enemy (yellow squares) in the lava. 

All the difficulty of the game is in the controls.

There is also enemy that are yellow squares. They can pop like popcorn tu push you away when you try to not move.

It looks good but difficult to understand.

This game was made by Aymco in 6 hours. I hope you will enjoy it !
